content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0)
- Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0)
- Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0)
- Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0)
- Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input automation-science-pack

### Storage at positions (43.5, -82.5), (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -81.5), (2.5, 0.5), (0.5, 2.5)
Consists of following entities
- Chest (position 43.5, -82.5) with coal
- Chest (position 40.5, -80.5) with no items
- Chest (position 43.5, -81.5) with no items
- Chest (position 2.5, 0.5) with no items
- Chest (position 0.5, 2.5) with no items
- Chest (position -16.5, -49.5) with iron ore

### Inserter system at positions (3.5, 0.5), (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5)
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drills have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the mining operation
### Errors when furnaces have no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting operation
### Errors when steam engine has no input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engine has a sufficient input liquid supply before starting the operation
### Errors when offshore pump has no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the offshore pump has a sufficient fluid supply in its connections before starting the operation
### Errors when lab has no power
- Ensure that the lab has a sufficient power supply before starting the operation
### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure that the pipe group has a sufficient fluid supply before starting the operation
### Errors when inserter system is waiting for source items
- Ensure that the inserter system has a sufficient source item supply before starting the operation
